alert.note: Alert for Bradford; Eastern Alachua; Western Alachua (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 22 at 3:10PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Bradford and northwestern Alachua Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 310 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Alachua, or 13 miles northwest of Gainesville, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Gainesville, Alachua, High Springs, La Crosse and Brooker. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
